job_title: Technical Lead - Redcat Hospitality IT Platform
job_purpose: Lead the technology and product development teams at Redcat Hospitality IT Platform to deliver valuable software solutions and drive continuous improvement in platform reliability and scalability.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead product development teams in delivering valuable software solutions with a focus on fast feedback and automation
Drive major architectural initiatives to enhance security, governance, and platform reliability
Collaborate with product & engineering to shape product roadmap and balance delivery with platform evolution
Mentor and coach software engineers to develop problem-solving skills and support career growth
Influence and negotiate with senior stakeholders to align outcomes with overall strategy
Evangelize Redcat's business strategy across product development teams
required_qualifications: Extensive experience in designing, developing, and maintaining cloud-first applications and APIs
Proven ability to lead technical roadmaps and implement CI/CD practices
Strong software engineering skills with a focus on well-tested, secure, and readable software
Demonstrated experience in technical leadership and mentoring software engineers
Experience in continuous delivery, agile, and lean practices
company_details: Redcat Hospitality IT Platform provides business-management software and hardware solutions for hospitality brands like Boost Juice, Nando's, Chatime, Grill'd, and Schnitz. The company values integrity, teamwork, customer-centricity, innovation, and accountability. Redcat offers career growth opportunities, work flexibility, autonomy, and a high-performance culture.
